name: Dinner Tonight: Seared Salmon
description: It’s back to the cupboards for another recipe from Off the Shelf by Donna Hay. This time I had a nice piece of salmon and not a whole lot of time. I don’t usually like to fuss with seafood, trying...
recipeIngredient: 4 salmon filets (6 ounces or so a piece)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the ginger, sesame oil, and soy sauce in a large bowl. Add the salmon and let them marinate for 10 minutes per side.

Place frying pan over high heat, and let it warm up for a minute or two. When nice and smoking hot, toss in the salmon. Cook for about a minute or two per side, until nicely seared and roughly cooked through.
